data.description:
Welcome to the twisted realm of L.A.B., where nightmares become your reality. Step into the eerie virtual world that will test the limits of your courage and sanity. L.A.B. stands for Lurking Aberrations Beneath, and you're about to discover the horrifying secrets hidden deep within its digital corridors.

Immerse yourself in the spine-chilling atmosphere as you navigate through the abandoned and decaying research facility. Armed only with a flickering flashlight, you'll soon realize that you are not alone. Unearth the dark experiments gone wrong as mutated entities lurk in the shadows, waiting to strike when you least expect it.

What sets L.A.B. apart is its innovative use of Gorilla Tag locomotion. Feel the heart-pounding intensity as you swing through the virtual environment, desperately trying to escape the clutches of grotesque creatures. Use your agility to outsmart them or face a relentless pursuit that will leave you breathless.

The twisted narrative unfolds as you uncover the haunting past of the facility, solving puzzles to progress deeper into the madness. But beware, every step forward brings you closer to the malevolent forces that seek to consume your very soul.

L.A.B. is not just a game; it's a visceral experience that blurs the lines between reality and nightmare. Can you survive the horrors that await in the Lurking Aberrations Beneath? The choice is yours, but remember: in the darkness, your screams are only heard by the entities that crave your fear.
